title: Part A
stimulusHtml:
2 point(s) maximum

Identification (1 point)

• The water-only treatment

Reasoning (1 point)

• Unsprayed plot would not distinguish between effect of insecticide vs. effect of water

• Water only treatment attributes the effect of the insecticide treatment to the insecticide and not the water
